about_the_game:
Welcome to the Newton's Playground where your imagination is the limit! Get ready to have fun with physics and let your creativity run wild. Whether you want to build a bathtub car, a custom weapon that defies the laws of physics, or just enjoy some silly sandbox fun, Newton's Playground has something for everyone.

Physics


Explore a wide variety of objects and experiment with their physics. From simple shapes to complex tools, the game allows you to manipulate everything in your environment. With a range of customization options, you can modify the objects to your liking, creating unique scenarios that are limited only to your imagination.

Utility Guns


In this game, you have access to a variety of utility guns that allow you to manipulate the game's objects and environment in new and exciting ways. You can also scale objects up or down, creating giant versions of everyday objects or shrinking them to the size of your palm.

Physics puzzles


In addition to the sandbox mode, Newton's Playground also features a range of challenges and puzzles to solve. Each level offers a unique set of obstacles and goals, challenging you to use your creativity and problem-solving skills to overcome them.

Creator Mode

With the ability to create your own scenes, the possibilities are endless. You can choose from a wide range of objects, materials, and textures, and even customize their properties to create unique art. Use the game's tools and features to create scenes that are truly one-of-a-kind. The only limit is your imagination.




So, what are you waiting for? Grab your utility guns and start creating! The possibilities are endless in this sandbox game, and the only limit is your imagination.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • VR Support: Open XR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • VR Support: Open XR

short_description: Newton's Playground is a physics-based VR sandbox, where you can do pretty much anything you would want to. Introducing one of the most advanced and dynamic physics game in VR.
